thread.title: Brooks Automation Schedules Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2015 Earnings Announcement
thread.title_full: Brooks Automation Schedules Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2015 Earnings Announcement

title: Brooks Automation Schedules Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2015 Earnings Announcement
text:
Brooks Automation Schedules Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2015 Earnings Announcement October 23, 2015 17:00 ET | Source: Brooks Automation, Inc. 
CHELMSFORD, Mass., Oct. 23, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brooks Automation, Inc. (Nasdaq: BRKS ) will announce fiscal 2015 fourth quarter and year-end earnings, which ended on September 30, 2015, on Thursday, November 5, 2015 after the market closes. The company will host a live webcast of its earnings conference call on the same day, Thursday, November 5, 2015 at 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time. 
Analysts, investors and members of the media can access the live webcast via the Brooks' website at www.brooks.com . 
About Brooks Automation, Inc. 
Brooks is a leading worldwide provider of automation and cryogenic solutions for multiple markets including semiconductor manufacturing and life sciences. Brooksâ€™ technologies, engineering competencies and global service capabilities provide customers speed to market and ensure high uptime and rapid response, which equate to superior value in their mission-critical controlled environments. Since 1978, Brooks has been a leading partner to the global semiconductor manufacturing market and, through product development initiatives and strategic business acquisitions, has expanded offerings to meet the needs of customers in the life sciences industry, analytical & research markets and clean energy solutions. Brooks is headquartered in Chelmsford, MA, with direct operations in North America, Europe and Asia. For more information, visit www.brooks.com . 
Lynne Yassemedis
